# go_info { #geneinfo.ontology.go_info }

```python
geneinfo.ontology.go_info(terms)
```

Displays HML formatted information about the given GO terms.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

<code>[**terms**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[Union](`typing.Union`)\[[str](`str`), [List](`typing.List`)\[[str](`str`)\]\]]{.parameter-annotation}</code>

:   A GO term or list of GO terms to display information for.
